data.eml:eml: A new species of Simpsonichthys (Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae) from the rio São Francisco basin, northeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nielsen, Dalton Tavares Bressane, Shibatta, Oscar Akio, Suzart, Rogério Dos Reis, Martín, Amer Faour (2010): A new species of Simpsonichthys (Cyprinodontiformes: Rivulidae) from the rio São Francisco basin, northeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 2452: 51-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293275
